body_html:
Hmm according to our docs at https://www.tensorflow.org/extend/adding_an_op, installing from pip should be OK: (under "Prerequisites") "Must have installed the TensorFlow binary, or must have downloaded TensorFlow source, and be able to build it."

@albertz if you're still working on this, it looks like you'll need to build from source for now, but we should either make the pip package include headers needed for custom op development or change our docs.

body:
Hmm according to our docs at https://www.tensorflow.org/extend/adding_an_op, installing from pip should be OK: (under "Prerequisites") "Must have installed the TensorFlow binary, or must have downloaded TensorFlow source, and be able to build it."

@albertz if you're still working on this, it looks like you'll need to build from source for now, but we should either make the pip package include headers needed for custom op development or change our docs.
